author: Google
description:
Google’s Senior Vice President of Research, Labs, Technology & Society James Manyika sits down with Father Paolo Benanti, a leading expert on AI, ethics, and technology, and professor at the Pontifical Gregorian University at the Vatican, for a discussion about the intersection of artificial intelligence and humanity. #Technology #AI 

00:23 What does AI mean for humanity?
01:41 Human flourishing in the AI era
03:04 The most important ethical issues for AI
04:43 How Father Benanti uses AI
07:01 The "Why" behind AI at Google

Watch more: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S-De1TvTw4o&list=PL590L5WQmH8f8ID51T0_9JkWpeL9Dcb-S

title: What can AI teach us about humanity? | Father Paolo Benanti & Google’s James Manyika
